meanings.sent1: The parasitologists carefully examined the tiny worms under the microscope.
meanings.sent2: The parasitologists published a groundbreaking research paper on malaria transmission.
meanings.sent3: The parasitologists joked that studying parasites was like solving a mystery.
meanings.sent4: The parasitologists are like detectives uncovering the secrets of the parasite world.
meanings.sent5: The parasitologists' passion for understanding parasites is truly inspiring.

meanings.definition: Experts in the field of parasitology.
meanings.sent1: Many parasitologists work in research labs to advance our knowledge of parasites.
meanings.sent2: The parasitologists gathered at the conference to share their latest findings.
meanings.sent3: The parasitologists play a crucial role in protecting public health from harmful parasites.
meanings.sent4: The parasitologists are the unsung heroes fighting against unseen enemies.
meanings.sent5: The parasitologists' dedication to their work is truly admirable.
